backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining the Pomodoro app backend with user profile CRUD, session saving, streak tracking, theme/sound updates, and role-based access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping each product feature (timer, break settings, sound customization, themes, etc.) to the frontend/backend files and test IDs that implement them.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing one-sentence descriptions of every frontend source file, serving as a quick reference for what each component, hook, and utility does.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark color tokens used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the Vite/React app titled 'Pomo Bloom' that mounts the React root and loads Google Fonts preconnect links.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication state, theme application, profile setup gating, and page routing between Timer, Dashboard, and Settings views.
Displays a 2×4 grid of four milestone streak badges (3/7/14/30 days), shown in full color when earned and greyed out when locked.
frontend/src/components/BreakSettings.ts: Settings panel with stepper controls for configuring focus duration, short break, long break, and long-break interval with enforced min/max bounds.
frontend/src/components/Dashboard.tsx: Displays a user stats dashboard with a 2x2 stat grid (pomodoros, focus time, streaks), a 7-day bar chart using Recharts, and a badge collection, fetching data from profile and session queries.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Provides the main app shell with a sticky header (logo, navigation, login button), a centered main content area, and a footer with a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, and a loading state with appropriate icons.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Renders a pill-style tab navigation bar with Timer, Stats, and Settings items, highlighting the active page.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Shows a modal dialog for new users to enter their name and initialize their profile with default settings on first login.
Displays a full-screen celebration overlay with confetti animation and a motivational message when a Pomodoro session is completed.
frontend/src/components/SoundSettings.ts: Provides a UI for selecting a notification sound from four options and adjusting volume, with preview playback and persistence via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/StreakBadge.tsx: Renders a styled badge displaying the user's current streak in days, with visual variants for hot streaks (≥7 days) and milestone values.
frontend/src/components/ThemePicker.tsx: Renders a list of selectable color themes with swatches, updating the user's theme preference via a mutation when a new theme is clicked.
frontend/src/components/Timer.tsx: Main Pomodoro timer component that renders a circular SVG countdown, mode indicators (focus/short break/long break), task name input, and controls (play/pause/reset/skip), triggering session saves and reward animations on focus completion.
frontend/src/data/motivationalMessages.t: Defines an array of emoji-paired motivational messages shown after completing a Pomodoro session, with a helper function to pick one at random.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates all dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status via a React context backed by DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including user profile, Pomodoro sessions, theme, and sound profile via the ICP actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTimer.ts: Custom hook implementing Pomodoro timer logic with configurable focus/break durations, interval-based countdown, mode transitions, and callbacks on focus session completion.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, sets up Tailwind, and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for multiple color themes (Cherry Blossom, Mint Garden, Lavender Dream, Sunny Citrus, Midnight Stars) including timer ring colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with TanStack QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Simple page component that renders a header and the Dashboard component to display the user's Pomodoro progress statistics.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Renders the Settings page with sections for sound settings and theme picker, using card-style layout with cute aesthetic styling.
frontend/src/pages/TimerPage.tsx: Renders the Timer page with a decorative header and a card container wrapping the main Timer component.
frontend/src/styles/themes.ts: Defines theme configurations (colors, CSS class, emoji, description) for five visual themes and exports a lookup helper function.
frontend/src/utils/audio.ts: Provides Web Audio API-based sound playback utilities for four sound types (bell, chime, ding, nature) with volume control via a shared AudioContext.
frontend/src/utils/dateHelpers.ts: Exports date/time formatting and session aggregation helpers, including countdown formatting, day/week key generation, and last-7-days session data extraction.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters from query strings or hash-based routes, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts, OKLCH-based color tokens, border radii, box shadows, and accordion animations, with typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state including version, feature list, architectural notes, image requirements, and known issues for the Pomodoro timer app.
